recipesJson.name: Lime Cream
recipesJson.author: Gwandrei
recipesJson.description: This is a nice lime and light cream recipe. For some reason the strawberry and the pear help this recipe shine, but the honeysuckle and oba oba is what really gives this flavor something special. When you vape this all's you'll taste is a nice subtle lime with a nice light cream, great mouth feel, smooth and just enough sweetness. Hope you enjoy.
